alert.note: Alert for Stokes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 12:47PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stokes, southwestern Henry and southeastern Patrick Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Germanton, or 7 miles north of Winston-Salem, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Walnut Cove... Stuart... Danbury... Francisco... Sandy Ridge... King... and Pine Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
